title: Blue Screen when I try to open the League client
body: So when I try to open the League client, my computer crashes with the error code "BAD_POOL_CALLER". This only started yesterday, and it looks like the error has something to do with memory or something along those lines? I've tried to reinstall the game, and updated my graphics driver but it doesn't look like it helps. I'm still not sure whether or not this is an issue that the client is having or if it is my computer. Any help would be appreciated!

replies.body: This can be pretty scary to see, and it might be due to hardware failure.  It could be overheating as well, so definitely look over your vents and make sure it's clear for air flow.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well and our tech team can work with you directly to figure out what's going on.  We'll see you there!

You might be creating a lot of dust in this case, which could block out your air vents.  :X  If that's not it, definitely hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help!
